item.title: Zior Park - PSYCHO LOVE(영화 "모나리자와 블러드 문")
item.description:
How to love?
I mean what you want
You said mine is wrong
then what your thought
I know it
could be tough
But I got my own way
to love you
What is love?
I mean what you know
You said I’m a monster
(don’t hurt me more)
I proved
enough
But I got my own way
to love you
Psycho love didn’t
mean to hurt
Hear
my pulse
Sounds
like the thunder
Psycho love feels
like a curse
Hard to know
but it was pure
Don’t expect me
to be an ordinary man
I hate
those guys
Though I’m tryna
disguise as them
I used to think
about killing them
You should
know
They don’t have
any soul
They only got
the fur and the flesh
I hope you
to be changed
I can give you
a chance
You just hold
my hand
You don’t need
to be afraid
I’m not
like your dad
I won’t make you
a princess
It’s not a fairytales
imagine my queen
How to explain
my big love
(You have no idea
girl)
Look
my heart is blue
Like the moon
(like the moon)
How to love?
I mean what you want
You said mine is wrong
then what your thought
I know it
could be tough
But I got my own way
to love you

I mean what you know

enough

to love you

mean to hurt

my pulse
Sounds
like the thunder
Psycho love feels
like a curse
Hard to know
but it was pure
Psycho love didn’t
mean to hurt
Hear
my pulse
Sounds
like the thunder
Psycho love feels
like a curse
Hard to know
but it was pure
What you know
‘bout?
Don’t overstep
the line
Don’t waste
my time
I already told you
twice
What’re you worrying
‘bout?
It’s gon’ be alright
get used
To the new stigma
that I gave you
Love abuse
hallelujah
You have
to be my believer
Stay in my church
I’ll give you
Entertainment
and education
Oh baby
you’re gonna
Like it
I guarantee you
You said
you love the badass
Perfectly I’m here
why’re you hesitating
I know I’m crazy
but I’m a gentleman
Don’t try to run away
here’s no exit
How to love?
I mean what you want
You said mine is wrong
then what your thought
I know it
could be tough
But I got my own way
to love you

I mean what you know
You said I’m a monster
(don’t hurt me more)
I proved
enough
But I got my own way
to love you
Psycho love didn’t
mean to hurt
Hear
my pulse
Sounds

Hard to know
but it was pure

item.description:
Money makes me
feel better
You
told me
It was a ticket
to hell OK how come?

feel better

item.description:
I was a machine
it was my choice
No love
in my pockets

for the cash

this way

what the heck

it doesn’t matter

curious

of this feeling

don’t tell me

beautiful
